Doña Milagro is an enterprising woman who strives to help her two children, both of whom are in school, get ahead. She makes her sales from her house and also as a street vendor. She is an example of optimism and responsibility, since she is one of Prisma Honduras’ best clients.

Doña Milagro is requesting a loan to purchase rice, sugar, coffee, beans, soft drinks, churros (fritters), vegetables, bread, milk, salsas, pastas, etc. Through this loan, she hopes to improve her earnings and in this way also improve her living conditions because she wants to sell a lot of groceries during this winter season.

Doña Milagro’s dream is to have her house in better condition and she also has a good project, a pigsty that she wants to expand.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – March, 2013.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, coffee, beans, soft drinks, churros (fritters), vegetable, bread, milk, salsas, pastas, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Dixia Dinora

texts.es:
La joven Dinora una es una persona muy  emprendedora  honesta  y seria, vive con su esposo  no tiene hijos, vive en una comunidad en el  sur de Honduras. 
Doña Dinora su negocio es la  venta  de tortillas, el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de  maíz, lena y cal.  Con el préstamo espera que las ventas en su negocio  mejoren al tener más producto que ofrecer a los clientes y  así cubrir las necesidades de los mismos.
Doña Dinora  espera que  a un corto plazo  su negocio siga  creciendo y  consolidándose  para que se convierta en el más grande  y  reconocido de su caserío. Y seguir  apoyando a su esposo.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Marzo  del   2013
texts.en:
Young Dinora is a very hardworking, honest, and reliable person.  She lives with her husband in a community in the south of Honduras.  They don't have children.  

Dinora's business is selling tortillas.  She needs the loan to buy corn, firewood, and lime.  She hopes the loan will allow her to improve the business by having more product to offer customers as well as cover related costs.  She hopes that in the short term the business will keep growing and strengthening into something bigger and more well-known in her village, and that she can continue to help out her husband.

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, and lime for her business.

loans.name: Julia Margarita

texts.es:
La Señora. Julia forma parte del banco comunal Cochapamba, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este lugar se encuentra rodeados de verdes campos gracias a la agricultura que realizan sus habitantes, también se dedican a la crianza de animales y comercio, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones, su arquitectura es una mezcla de la antiguo y lo moderno.

La Señora. Julia tiene 43 años, es madre soltera de 4 hijos de 23, 21, 19 y 12 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propia.
 
Doña Julia se dedica desde hace algunos años a la cría y venta de cerdos, pollos y cuyes, los cuales los vende en su comunidad.

Su crédito lo a invertir en la compra de cerdos, pollos, cuyes y alimento para sus animales.

Su meta es tener más animales para la venta.
texts.en:
Julia is part of Cochapamba Communal Bank.  She lives on the outskirts of Valle Parish in Cuenca, a place surrounded by green fields thanks to the residents' farming.  They also work raising animals and in trade, they preserve their culture and traditions, and the architecture is a mix of old and modern.

Julia, 43, is the single mother of four children, ages 23, 21, 19, and 12.  Her two older children work and help her economically and the younger two attend school in the city.  The house she lives in is her own.

Julia has made a living for several years raising and selling pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs, which she sells in her community.

She's going to invest her loan in buying pigs, chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

Her goal is to have more animals to sell.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed

loans.name: María Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora María forma parte del banco comunal Cochapamba desde hace algún tiempo atrás, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle  en Cuenca,este lugar se encuentra rodeados de verdes campos gracias a la agricultura que realizan sus habitantes, también se dedican a la crianza de animales y comercio, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones, su arquitectura es una mezcla de la antiguo y lo moderno.

Doña María tiene 52 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 10 hijos, 6 de ellos son casados y viven independientes, una de sus hijas trabaja para sus gastos y tres están estudiando dos en el colegio y uno en la escuela de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta sus servicios de manera independiente, la casa en la que viven es propia.

La Señora. María hace algunos años se dedica a la venta de quesos, negocio que le ha permitido solventar algunos gastos de su casa, también se dedica a la crianza de animales, le gusta mucho esta actividad ya que es su propio jefe y el dinero que percibe es a diario.
 
El crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de quesos de los cuales obtuvo buenas ganancias, está repitiendo el crédito ya quiere comprar más quesos para la venta y alimento para sus animales.
texts.en: Maria has been member of the Cochapamba communal bank for a long time now. She lives on the outskirts of the parish of Valle de Cuenca, a place that is surrounded by green fields as a result of the agricultural work of the people that live there. The people also work rearing animals and trading goods. They maintain their culture and traditions, and the architecture there is a mixture of old and modern styles. María is 52 years old, married, and as a result of her marriage has 10 children, six of whom are married and live independently. One of her daughters works to support her, and three of her children are studying - two at secondary school and one at the local school. Her husband is a driver and offers his services on a freelance basis. The house they live in belongs to them. María has been selling cheeses for some years now, and this business has allowed her to cover some of the household expenses. She also rears animals. María enjoys her work because she is her own boss and she receives payments every day. She invested the previous loan in the purchase of cheeses from which she made a good profit. She is requesting a new loan to buy more cheeses to sell and more animal feed for her livestock.

loans.use: to buy cheeses to sell and animal feed for her animals.

loans.name: San Cristobal De Aparquilla Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN CRISTOBAL DE APARQUILLA”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cirila ella es conviviente tiene 03 hijos y tiene 52 años de edad; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, a la vez la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y a la venta de chicha, la socia se siente feliz con sus negocios ya que le trae  satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia espera poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de granos secos, tienda de abarrotes, venta de queso, venta de pasto, venta de leche, crianza de animales menores.

La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to a communal bank called "San Cristobal of Aparquilla," located in Anta District, Anta Province in the department of Cusco.  

This member is Cirila, who is 52, in a common law marriage, and has 3 children.  She alternates her day-to-day activities with her grocery store business where she sells a variety of products like rice, sugar, milk, candy, soft drinks,etc.  She also makes her living raising young animals like guinea pigs and selling chicha [corn beer].  Cirila feels happy with her businesses because they bring her satisfaction, both personal and financial.  She hopes to be able to continue working so she can keep on supporting her family.

Cirila is seeking a loan to buy merchandise, like soft drinks, for her business.

The other members earn their livings selling dried grains; running a grocery; selling cheese; selling feed; selling milk; and raising young animals.  The member shown in the attached photo requested permission to come late to the meeting because she had to work.  

Cirila appreciates the members who are part of this dream and promises to make her payments in full and on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: María Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora. María forma parte del banco comunal Cochapamba hace algunos años, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este lugar se encuentra rodeados de verdes campos gracias a la agricultura que realizan sus habitantes, también se dedican a la crianza de animales y comercio, mantienen su cultura y tradiciones, su arquitectura es una mezcla de la antiguo y lo moderno.

La Señora María tiene 50 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos, dos de sus hijos son casados, uno de ellos vive independiente y el otro vive en su casa, su hijo soltero trabaja y le ayuda económicamente. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

Doña María se dedica a la cría y venta de pollos, borregos y ganado, también se dedica a la agricultura cultivando varios productos que son para el consumo de su hogar y para la venta,  este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres siendo la mejor herencia que heredo de ellos, así ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su estabilidad económica.

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de  animales de los cuales obtuvo buenas ganancias, este nuevo crédito es para comprar pollos y borregos de mejor calidad y también alimento para todos sus animales. El banco comunal le gusta por la unión y compañerismo que se fomenta gracias al banco comunal y los créditos le permiten seguir creciendo en sus pequeños negocios.
texts.en:
María has been part of Cochapamba Communal Bank for several years.  She lives on the outskirts of El Valle Parish in Cuenca, a place surrounded by green fields thanks to the residents who farm there.  They also make a living raising animals and in trade, they preserve their culture and traditions, and the architecture is a mix of old and modern.

María, 50, is married and has three children from this marriage.  Two of her children are married, one who lives independently and the other in her house.  Her single son works and helps her financially.  Her husband works in the construction field as a bricklayer.  The house in which she lives is her property.

María makes a living raising and selling chickens, sheep, and livestock.  She also works in agriculture, growing various products for home consumption and for sale.  She learned this job from her parents and it's the best thing she inherited from them because she has managed to get her children ahead and improve her financial stability.

She invested her previous loan in buying animals, from which she got a good profit.  This new loan is to buy a higher quality of chickens and sheep and also feed for all her animals.

She likes the communal bank because of the closeness and camaraderie it encourages.  Thanks to the communal bank and the loans they can continue to grow in their small businesses.

loans.use: to buy chickens, sheep, and animal feed

loans.name: Los Lirios Group

texts.es: El grupo “LOS LIRIOS” está conformado por 6 mujeres emprendedoras ellas se encuentran pasando el ciclo 26. Angélica es tesorera del grupo. Dedicada a la venta de pescados en el mercado I de Huaycan. Recibe apoyo  de su esposo y de sus 3 hijos en la actividad que realiza hace 15 años. Ella utilizará el préstamo para pintar y hacer algunos arreglos menores a su puesto de trabajo. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Angélica es la primera del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
"Los Lirios" group is made of six entrepreneur women and is going through its 26th cycle. Angélica is the group's treasurer and makes a living from selling fish in the market I of Huaycan. She receives support from her husband and her three children in this activity that she's been doing for 15 years.  She will use the loan to paint and make small improvements to her market stall. 

The group members are grateful to Kiva lenders for the loan. In the photo, Angélica is the first one to the left.

loans.use: to paint and fix her market stall

loans.name: Nu

texts.en:
Nu was born in 1975. She has two children, aged 17 and 14. Her husband and she cook food to sell in a market to earn a living. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month. Nu earns about 4,000,000 VND. She has done this job for ten years. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy ingredients to make food for her food stall.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food for her food stall.

loans.name: Nga Group

texts.en:
Nga was born in 1971. She has two children who are learning at secondary school and high school. She and her husband raise pigs to earn a living. From her job, she makes 4,000,000 VND a month. The total income of her family is 8,000,000 VND.

Nga has taken part in SEDA's loan program since 2009. In her last loan cycle, she borrowed 5,152,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for her pigs. She wants to raise her children well.

The other members who are part of Nga's group are: Dong, who was born in 1978 and wants to borrow 7,392,000 VND to raise pigs, and Luyen who was born in 1983 and wants to borrow 7,840,000 VND to raise chickens.

loans.use: to buy food for her pigs.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is 38 years old. She has three children who are aged 13, 8, and 6. Her husband is a carpenter and earns about 5,000,000 VND per month. Huong grows vegetables to earn a living. Her income is about 3,500,000 VND. She has done this job for 15 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,500,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2011. In the last cycle, she borrowed 7,392,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,288,000 VND to raise more vegetables to sell. She wants to raise her children well.

loans.use: to raise more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Peace Group

texts.en:
Reginah acquired a loan through Peace Group. She is 49 years old and a widow surviving with four school-aged children, and a total of five dependents. 
She started a restaurant business in the outskirts of Bushenyi to help meet the financial challenges of school fees and basic necessities for her family. Reginah hopes to expand her business, which started way-back in 1998, into a modern restaurant in Bushenyi. She works every day of the week apart from Sundays. Reginah hopes to purchase foodstuffs for her restaurant business. 
Her clients are people in and around Bushenyi. However, because of the traditional dishes Reginah prepares, she attracts people from areas far and wide and especially those who prefer 'Eshabwe', one of the famous traditional dishes made out of cow ghee. 
Reginah's challenges are debts, those who eat at her restaurant on credit, and that sometimes taxes are too harsh.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuff for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr: Maimouna est commercante depuis plus de 2 ans dans le commerce d'encens.Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants; c'est son mari qui est basé en Arabie Saoudite qui lui envoie le produit par le biais du port qu'elle revende dans son quartier tantot du comptant tantot à crédit. Elle commence sa journée à 11h pour la terminer à 17h. La principale charge de Maimouna est l'scolarité de ses filles. Elle souhaite à l'avenir acquérir d'un grand magasin pour pouvoir agrandir son commerce.
texts.en: Maimouna has been a seller of incense for over two years.  She is married and mother of two children.  Her husband in based in Saudi Arabia and sends her products through the port that she resells in her neighborhood, sometimes for cash and sometimes for credit.  She starts her day at 11 am and ends at 5 pm.  Her main responsibility is the education of her daughters.  She wishes to acquire a large store in the future to expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the customs clearance of a container of incense sent to her by her husband in Saudi Arabia

loans.name: Ngoné Sadio

texts.fr: Madame Ngoné Sadio est une brave femme qui s’active depuis 07 ans dans le métier de commerçante. Elle vend du Thiouraye, des parfums, des habits et des chaussures qu’elle écoule dans le quartier et dans les environs. Elle a une clientèle régulière et diverses. Madame Ngoné ne gère aucune charge familiale à part ses besoins individuels ; elle commence sa journée à 8h et descend à 16h. Avec le crédit, elle pourra augmenter son stock de produits et satisfaire toute la clientèle qui se présentera à elle. Elle a comme ambition, de chercher une boutique de produits divers afin de diversifier ses activités et de maximiser son profit. Elle souhaite aussi augmenter son capital pour avoir une indépendance financière.
texts.en:
Ngoné Sadio is a good woman who has been an active merchant for the past seven years. Her merchandise includes thiouraye (local incense), perfumes, clothing and shoes that she sells in her district and the surrounding area. Ngoné Sadio has a regular and diverse clientele, and is not responsible for any familial expenses aside from her individual needs.

Ngoné Sadio starts her day at 8 am and finishes working at 4 pm. With this loan, she will be able to increase her stock of merchandise and satisfy each and every one of her customers. Ngoné Sadio's ambition is to have various merchandise in stock in order to diversify her business and maximize her income. She also wants to increase her capital to achieve financial independence.

loans.use: to purchase thiouraye (local incense), perfumes, clothing and shoes for sale to her clientele.

loans.name: Book Yeugue Group

texts.fr: Elles sont cinq à s’être réunis chaque jour en groupe et donnent le nom de BOOK YEUGUE à leur groupement. Elles logent le même quartier et font toute du commerce. Madame Farma est la présidente du groupe, agée de 51 ans  et elle évolue dans la vente de produits divers. Elle a une expérience de plus de 5 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants. Elle en est à sa première expérience de crédit et cela lui permettra de renforcer son commerce de tissus teints (Thioub) et de pouvoir améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Avec ce crédit elle compte renforcer et diversifier ses produits. Farma commence sa journée à 8h  et la termine à 18h. Elle souhaite développer son activité à tel enseigne qu’elle n’aura plus besoin de crédit.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five women who meet each day and who have dubbed themselves the Book Yeugue Group. They live in the same district and are all merchants. Farma is the president of the group at 51 years of age. She is a merchant who sells various products.

Farma has over five years of experience. She is married and the mother of seven children. This is her first experience with a loan, and she hopes it will allow her to improve her business selling local dyed fabrics (Thioub) and to improve the health and nutrition of her family.

With this loan Farma plans to improve and diversify her products for sale. Farma starts her day at 8 am and finishes working at 6 pm. She wants to expand her business to the point where she no longer needs to rely on loans.

loans.use: to improve her business by purchasing local dyed fabrics (Thioub) and perfume to sell.

loans.name: Door War Group

texts.fr: Le Groupement DOR WAR travaille tous dans le même atelier. La présidente est celle qui a levé la main sur la photo. Elle s’appelle yacine ; étant célibataire, elle est âgée de 35 ans et a  une expérience de 10 ans dans le commerce. Elle a demandé le crédit pour renforcer leur fond de commerce de charbon, du lait, des produits alimentaires, de l’arachide et des glaces. A part ces besoins personnels, Yacine n’a aucune charge familiale. Elle souhait être pérenne pour ne plus avoir besoins des financements des mutuelles. Sa journée commence à 9h pour se terminer à 22h.
texts.en:
The DOR WAR Group  all work in the same workshop. The president is the one raising her hand in the photo. She is called Yacine, She is single, 35 years old and has 10 years' experience in the trade business.

She requested the credit loan to enhance their stock supply of coal, milk, food products, peanuts and ice cream. Besides these personal needs, Yacine has no family to support.

She wishes to be self-sustaining and no longer depend on mutual institution funding. Her day starts at 9 am and ends at 10 pm..

loans.use: Increase stock supply in the sale of coal, milk and food products

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: Madame Khady est une mère de 2 enfants ; elle habite pikine dans le quartier ou se situe le guichet. Ayant une expérience de 3 ans, c’est la 1ère fois qu’elle demande un crédit pour renforcer son commerce d’orange, de sucre et de savon. Sa principale charge familiale est sa petite fille. Elle commence sa journée le matin de 6h à 12h et le soir de 15h  pour la terminer à 19h. À l’avenir, elle souhaite renforcer son activité et ne plus avoir besoin de crédit.
texts.en:
Mrs Khady is a mother of two children. She lives in Pikine, in the neighborhood where the branch office is located.

With 3 years' experience, this is the first time she is requesting a loan to bolster her retail business of oranges, sugar and soap. Her main family responsibility is with her young daughter.

She starts her day in the morning from 6 am to 12 am and in the afternoon from 3 pm to closing time at 7 pm.

In the future, she hopes to strengthen her business and no longer rely on credit loans.

loans.use: Buy clementine oranges, sugar and soap for resale

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: L’emprunteur habite dans un village qui se situe à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Elle est marié et mère de famille. Rokhaya est vendeuse de charbon depuis plus de 05 ans. Elle commence sa journée à 9h et la termine à 18h. Avec les revenus de son commerce, Rokhaya appui son mari dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne du foyer. Et le crédit aura un impact sur les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Elle est à son 1ère crédit et continuera à solliciter des fonds  afin d’augmenter son capital pour voir augmenter aussi son bénéfice.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in a village located about 22 km from the main city. She is married and a mother. Rokhaya has been a coal merchant for more than five years. She starts her day at 9 am and finishes working at 6 pm.

With the income she earns, Rokhaya is able to help her husband pay for the household's daily expenses. This loan will have a positive impact on the family's nutrition and allow them to increase their food supply. This is Rokhaya's first loan, and she plans to continue to seek funding so that she can increase her capital and in turn increase the income she earns.

loans.use: to increase her charcoal sales and diviersify her merchandise by purchasing food products such as sugar and oil.

loans.name: Ndèye Bayang

texts.fr: Ndeye Mbayang  est une grande fille de 35 ans qui habite aux alentours du Guichet. C’est une commerçante , elle a 10 ans d’expérience dans le commerce des prêts à porter  qu’elle vendait  durant les prestations des fêtes (Signard) qu’on organise dans la région de Saint-Louis. Mademoiselle Ndeye Mbayang n’a pas de charge familiale. Avec ce crédit elle voudrait diversifier son commerce avec la vente des tissus comme le Wax, le Thioub et les blouses des écoles. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 20h. Elle souhaite ouvrir des écoles de formation pour  des jeunes filles et garçons de son quartier.
texts.en:
Ndèye Bayang is a 35 year old woman who lives near the local branch office. Ndèye Bayang is a merchant with ten years of experience in her trade. She sells ready to wear clothing, sold primarily during the holiday services (Signard) held in the region of Saint-Louis. Ndèye Bayang has no family to support.

With this loan she wants to diversify her commerce with the sale of fabrics like wax (high quality pagnes, traditional West African printed cloth), thioub (dyed cotton damask cloth) and school blouses. Ndèye Bayang starts her day at 8 am and finishes working at 8 pm. Her hope is to open training schools for girls and boys in her district.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics to turn them into ready to wear clothing that she can sell.

loans.name: Ndoumbé

texts.fr: Madame Ndoumbé  est une dame de 30 ans qui évolue dans le commerce de  la pharmacie traditionnelle. Elle a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter des feuilles, des racines et du miel pour pouvoir les transformer et en faire des médicaments traditionnels. La charge principale de Ndoumbé es t le paiement de sa location, elle a une expérience de 8 ans dans son activité. Elle débute sa journée à 8h pour fermer la porte de sa  pharmacopée à 21h. La médecine traditionnelle étant trop sollicité dans la région, Madame Ndoumbé souhaite avec l’aide de l’IMCEC ouvrir une autre pharmacopée.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ndoumbé is a 30-year-old lady whose business activity is traditional pharmacy. She needs this loan to buy leaves, roots and honey in order to transform them into traditional medicines.

Ndoumbé's main burden is to pay the rent. She has 8 years' experience in the business. She begins her day at 8 am and closes the door to her pharmacy at 9 pm.

Traditional medicine being overstretched in the region, Mrs. Ndoumbé hopes - with the help of IMCEC - to open another pharmacy.

loans.use: Buy traditional products such as leaves, roots and honey to turn them into traditional medicines

loans.name: Salamata Samba

texts.fr:
La dame Salamata est une brave commerçante qui habite dans les environs du Guichet. On ne lui donne même pas son age à l’apparence car elle est très active. Agée de 48 ans Salamata fait des voyages dans la sous région en achetant des oranges, des biscuits et du savon qu’elle revende dans son quartier. Avec ce crédit elle veut acheter de nouveaux produits comme le sucre pour diversifier son commerce. Elle a un seul enfant à sa charge et s’active depuis 05 ans dans ce commerce.
Elle commence sa journée à 7h du matin pour la terminer à 19h. Son principal souhait est devenir le fournisseur potentiel du marché.
texts.en:
Salamata is a courageous shopkeeper who lives near Guichet. She certainly doesn't look her age, since she is very active. At 48 years old, Salamata travels throughout the sub-region, purchasing oranges, cookies, and soap that she sells in her neighborhood. With this loan, she wants to purchase new goods, like sugar, to diversify her business.

Salamata has one child in her care and has been working in this business for five years. She begins her day at 7am and finishes at 7pm. Her greatest wish is to become a potential supplier for the market.

loans.use: To purchase new goods such as oranges, sugar, and cookies to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goats for selling

loans.name: Raweltaaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme HABIBOU représente le groupe RAWELTAABA. Mariée, elle est mère de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 25ans et le moins âgé a 05ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge. 
Mme vend du Zoom Kom (jus local) depuis 04ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Watinooma. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter 01sac de petit mil et 01sac de sucre pour la préparation du Zoom Kom (jus local).
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices afin de s’acquérir un moyen de déplacement. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité et  scolariser d’avantage ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. HABIBOU represents the group RAWELTAABA. She is the married mother of six children. The oldest is 25 years old, and the youngest is 5. Three go to school. She has three persons to support. 

Ms. HABIBOU has been selling Zoom Kom (a local beverage) for four years. She gets her supplies in Watinooma. Her customers include both men and women. She wants to purchase a sack of pearl millet and a sack of sugar for making Zoom Kom (a local beverage). She wants to save her profits in order to acquire a means of transport. Her ambition is to expand her business and to provide more education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase pearl millet and sugar for making Zoom Kom (a local beverage).

loans.name: Kota Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mr MAHAMADI représente le groupe KOTA WENDE.  Il est célibataire sans enfant. Personne  ne va à l’école. Il n’a personnes en charge. 
Mr  vend des cartes de recharge depuis 03ans. Il s’approvisionne à Tampouy et à kolgnaba. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes.
Il veut s’acheter 30cartes de recharge et des unités (flash, sap sap et nana express).
Mr  veut épargner ses bénéfices. Il  ambitionne agrandir sa société de vente de carte de recharge et  mieux s’occuper de sa famille (ses parents).
texts.en: Mr. MAHAMADI represents the group  KOTA WENDE. He is unmarried, without children, and has no one to support. Mr. MAHAMADI has been selling phone recharge cards for three years. He gets his supplies in Tampouy and in Kolgnaba. His customers include both men and women. He want to purchase 30 recharge cards and some units (flash, sap sap, and nana express). He wants to save his profits. His ambition is to expand his phone use company and to take better care of his family (his parents).

loans.use: to purchase phone minutes and some units (flash, sap sap, and nana express).

loans.name: Iris De Paz

texts.es:
La Señora Iris es trabajadora de un colegio publico impartiendo clases de primarias a niños entre 8 a 12 años desde hace 22 años,actualmente ella tiene problemas de salud donde necesita realizarse una series de exámenes médicos como por ejemplo ultrasonidos, radiografía y otros.

La señora es primera vez que va a tener una relación crediticia con ceprodel, espera que le sea aprobado su crédito.
texts.en: Iris has worked at a public school teaching elementary children aged between 8 and 12 for 22 years.  She’s currently having some health problems and needs a series of tests like ultrasound, x-rays and others.  This is the first time she’s had a credit relationship with Ceprodel and she hopes her loan will be funded.

loans.use: to pay for some medical tests.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La Señora Juana es profesora del preescolar publico donde asisten niños de 3 a 5 años de edad a recibir clase doña Juana tiene 23 años de estar trabajando con niños, actualmente esta tramitando un diploma universitario para su hija ya que esta por graduarse y necesita el dinero para los gastos de tramites de diploma y modulo de defensa de la carrera universitaria, que solicita un crédito para facilitarle una mejor condición de vida a ella y su familia.
texts.en: Juana is a pre-school teacher at a public pre-school where children aged 3 to 5 attend; she’s been working with children for 23 years.  She’s currently taking care of paying for her daughter’s university diploma since she’s about to graduate.  She needs money to pay diploma fees and to pay for the final course work in defense of her university career.  She's requesting this loan to provide a better living condition for her and her family.

loans.use: to pay diploma costs.

loans.name: Sapela

texts.en: Sapela is a 39-year-old married woman with four children. She has a small plantation and grows yam, taro crops, bananas etc to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Sapela has requested a loan to purchase new equipment. She has been a member of SPBD since 2006. With her profits, Sapela hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, bush knives, gloves, and a wheel barrow,.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy scrap for scrap selling business

loans.name: Gouwend Manegre Group

texts.fr:
Mme CHRISTINE représente le groupe GOUWEND MANEGRE. Mariée, elle est mère de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 01 va à l’école. Elle a 04 personnes en charge. 
Mme fait la transformation (dolo) boisson local  depuis 05ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Yagma. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes du quartier.
Elle veut s’acheter 03sacs de mil germé pour la préparation du dolo (boisson local).
Mme veut épargner et renforcer son activité avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité et  améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. CHRISTINE represents the group GOUWEND MANEGRE. She is the married mother of six children. The oldest is 21 years old, and the youngest is 2. One goes to school. She has four persons to support. 

Ms. CHRISTINE has been making a local drink (dolo) for five years. She gets her supplies in Yagma. Her customers are the men and women in the neighborhood. She wants to purchase 3 sacks of sprouted millet for making 'dolo' (the local drink). She wants to save money and bolster her business with her profits. Her ambition is to expand her business and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase sprouted millet for making 'dolo' (a local beverage).

loans.name: Espoir Group

texts.fr:
Mr WENDDINMI représente le groupe ESPOIR.  Il est marié, père de  02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 06ans et le moins âgé 03ans. 01 va à l’école. 
Mr  vend des produits de beauté depuis 02ans. Il s’approvisionne au grand marché. Ses clients sont les femmes.
Il veut s’acheter 14douzaines de parfum toutes catégories confondues.
Mr  veut épargner ses bénéfices. Il  ambitionne s’acheter une moto.
texts.en:
Mr. WENDDINMI represents the group ESPOIR. He is married and a father of two children. The oldest is six years old, and the youngest is 3. One goes to school. Mr. WENDDINMI has been selling beauty products for two years. He gets his supplies at the big market. His customers are women. 

He is going to purchase 14 dozen of perfumes of various types. He wants to save his profits. His ambition is to purchase a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes of all types to sell

loans.name: Felicita Del Carmen

texts.es: Felicita de 35 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 15 y 16 años de edad. Felicita posee una venta de productos plásticos como canastas, masetas en diferentes tamaños, recipientes para colocar comida, recipientes grandes para colocar agua (llamados en el salvador "guacales") desde hace 8 años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal cerca de su lugar de residencia lugar en el cual cuenta con muchos clientes. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos plásticos en diferentes numeraciones y tamaños y asi aumentar sus productos y sus ganancias ya que es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi podra darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Felicita, 35, lives with her husband and two children, ages 15 and 16. Felicita has a small shop selling plastic products such as baskets, plant pots in different sizes, food containers, big water containers (called "guacales" in El Salvador). She has been doing this work for 8 years. Her business is located in the municipal market near her home where she has many customers. 

She is requesting a loan so she can buy more plastic products in different sizes and numbers so she can increase her products and profits since it is her only source of employment and thus could give her family a better economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase plastic products to sell.

loans.name: Tindwende Group

texts.fr:
Mme SAFIATA représente le groupe TINDWENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 05ans et le moins âgé a 07mois. Personne ne va à l’école. 
Mme vend des œufs  depuis 05ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Gounghin. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes,  gérants  de kiosque et boutique.
Elle veut s’acheter 20plaquets d’œufs.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices afin de renforcer son activité. Elle ambitionne augmenter  sa clientèle et  mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mme SAFIATA is a representative of the group TINDWENDE. She is married and is mother to 02 children. The oldest is 05 years old and the youngest is 07 months old. None of her children are in school.
Mme SAFIATA has been selling eggs for 05 years. She gets her supplies from Gounghin. Her customers are men, women, shop managers and kiosk managers.
She wants to buy 20 trays of eggs.
Mme SAFIATA wants to save her profits to strengthen her business. She aims to increase her customer base and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy 20 trays of eggs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To repair the engine of an autorickshaw for a transport business.

loans.name: Ros

texts.en: Ros is 56 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been running a grocery store for more than a year, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a councillor of the district who makes an income of $4 each day. Four of her children are employed in garment factories and earn about $14 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s finances, Ros is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce the transportation expense. In the future, she would like to expand her store and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Absa

texts.fr: Madame Absa est une femme mariée et mère de 7 enfants; elle est agée de 50 ans et evolue dans la vente des légumes et produits halieutiques. Son principale charge est de soutenir son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes. Absa a une expérience de 20 ans dans son activité, elle vient au marché à 8h pour le quitter à 15h. Malgré son age, Absa est brave et avec ce prêt, elle compte augmenter ses revenus pour satisfaire sa demande et ensuite améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. Elle souhaite réhabiliter sa chambre et renforcer son activité.
texts.en: Madame Absa is married and mother to seven children; she is 50 years old and experienced in the sale of vegetables and fish products. Her main responsibility is to support her husband with the daily expenses. Absa has 20 years of experience in this business. She starts work in the market at 8am and finishes at 3pm. Despite her age, Absa is courageous and plans to use this loan to increase her revenue in order to meet demand and also to improve the living conditions of her family. She wants to renovate her bedroom and strengthen her business.

loans.use: to buy and sell vegetables and fish products in a municipal market

loans.name: Wendlakogda Group

texts.fr:
Mme T.JULIENNE représente le groupe WENDLAKOGDA. Mariée, elle est mère de 05enfants. Le plus âgé a 16ans et le moins âgé a 03mois. 03 vont à l’école. 
Mme vend du dolo (boisson local)  depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Bissighin. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter 30bidon de dolo (boisson local) pour revendre.  
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices afin de renforcer son activité. Elle ambitionne agrandir  son champs d’activité  et  mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mme. T. JULIENNE is a representative of the group WENDLAKOGDA. She is married and is mother to 05 children. The oldest is 16 years old and the youngest is 03 months old. 03 of her children are in school.
Mme. T. JULIENNE has been selling dolo (a local drink) for 03 years. She gets her supplies from Bissighin. Her customers are both men and women.
She wants to buy 30 cans of dolo (a local drink) for resale.
Mme. T. JULIENNE wants to save her profits to strengthen her business. She aims to expand her area of business and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy 30 cans of dolo (a local drink) for resale.

loans.name: Mukundane Group

texts.fr:
Astère fait partie du groupe Mukundane  et   habite à Bujumbura. Il a   33 ans et est marié à Emmanuella, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont  2 enfants, âgés de 2  à 5 ans, dont 1 étudie.

Il fait le commerce de restaurant  depuis 9 ans. 

Il  est à son  cinquième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz, de haricot, d'huile de palme à revendre cuits dans son restaurant, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait construire sa propre maison à Bujumbura et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Astère is a member of the Mukundane group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 33 years old and married to Emmanuella, a trader. Together they have two children, who are two and five years old. One of the children is in school.

Astère has been in the restaurant business for nine years and this is his fifth loan from Turame. This Kiva loan will increase his capital and enable him to buy a large quantity of rice, beans and palm oil to cook and resell in his restaurant, allowing him to earn more. 

In the years to come, he would like to build his own house in Bujumbura and see his children go to school.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of rice, beans and palm oil to cook and sell in his restaurant to increase his income.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To increase her capital and purchase many fish to sell in order to earn more.

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr: Komlan est un homme âgé de 29 ans. Il est célibataire. Komlan travaille comme revendeur de produits de quincaillerie depuis 2011. Il revend ses marchandises dans une boutique et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Komlan a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des peintures et grillages. Il veut réinvestir dans son activité en devenant grossiste et se lancer plus tard dans la vie maritale.
texts.en: Komlan is a 29-year-old man. He is unmarried and has been working as a retailer of hardware items since 2011. He sells his merchandise in a store and gets his supplies in Lomé. Komlan has requested his second WAGES loan to purchase some paints and some wire mesh or gratings. He wants to reinvest in his business while becoming a wholesaler, and he wants to begin a life in marriage later on.

loans.use: to purchase hardware to sell

loans.name: Alewobouma

texts.fr: Alewobouna est âgée de 49ans. Elle vit avec son mari superviseur et leurs 02 enfants scolarisés à Lomé. Ils sont âgés de 15 et 10ans. Pour soutenir son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle revend de la friperie dans un marché de la place. C’est pour renforcer son activité qu’elle fait son premier crédit à WAGES. Elle espère avec le profit subvenir aux besoins de la famille tout en gardant pérenne son activité.
texts.en: Alewobouna is 49 years old. She lives in Lomé with her husband, a supervisor, and their two children, who are in school. To support her husband in covering household expenses, she sells secondhand clothing at a local market. To bolster her business, she is taking out her first WAGES loan. She hopes to use the profits to meet family needs while keeping her business sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Revendeuse d’alimentation générale dans une boutique, Akossiwa vit avec son conjoint professeur et leurs enfants à Lomé. Elle exerce cette activité pour aider son conjoint dans les charges du foyer. Démarré en 2005, elle s’approvisionne à Lomé. Son troisième crédit lui permettra d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale pour mieux satisfaire les besoins des clients. Elle espère agrandir son activité et aider ses enfants à mieux s’épanouir.
texts.en: A retailer in a grocery store, Akossiwa lives with her husband, a teacher, and their children in Lomé. She has this business to help out her husband in covering household expenses. Having started in 2005, she gets her supplies in Lomé. Her third loan will enable her to purchase grocery items in order to satisfy further the needs of her customers. She hopes to expand her business and help her children do better in their development.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items

loans.name: Confiance Group

texts.fr:
Berchmans fait partie du groupe Confiance  et   habite à Bujumbura. C’est un célibataire de   31 ans. 

Il fait le commerce de  bière et de limonade depuis 9 ans. 

Il  est à son  deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de casiers de bière et de limonade à revendre , pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait devenir un commerçant  grossiste de  bière et de limonade;  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Berchmans belongs to the group Confiance and lives in Bujumbura. He is unmarried and 31 years old. He has been selling beer and lemonade for nine years. 

He is on his second Turame loan. With this KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase many cases of beer and lemonade to sell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to become a wholesale merchandise selling beer and lemonade and to see his children go to school.

loans.use: to purchase many cases of beer and lemonade to sell in his bistro

loans.name: Isezerano Group

texts.fr:
Goreth  fait partie du groupe Isezerano  et   habite à Bujumbura. Elle  a   36 ans et est mariée à Juma, un commerçant. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants, âgés de 1mois  à 20 ans, dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de restaurant  depuis 9 ans. 

Elle  est à son  troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz, de haricot à  revendre  cuits dans son restaurant; pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait construire sa propre maison à Bujumbura et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Goreth belongs to the group Isezerano and lives in Bujumbura. She is 36 years old and married to Juma, a merchant. Together they have four children, from 1 month old to 20 years old, of whom two are in school.

Goreth has had a restaurant for nine years. She is on her third Turame loan. With this KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a large quantity of rice and beans to cook and sell in her restaurant, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, she would like to build her own house in Bujumbura and to see her children go to school.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of rice and beans to cook and sell in her restaurant

loans.name: Komi

texts.fr: Komi vit avec sa femme et leur enfant de 07 mois à Lomé. Pour assurer  son rôle de père de famille, il revend depuis 2009 des chaussures dans un marché de la ville et s’approvisionne au même lieu. Il espère renforcer son activité en ouvrant une boutique et assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en: Komi lives with his wife and their 7-month-old child in Lomé. For assuming his role as the family's father, he has been selling shoes since 2009 at a market in town, and he gets his supplies in the same place. He hopes to bolster his business by opening a store and to ensure his family is self-sufficient in terms of food.

loans.use: to purchase shoes

loans.name: Afiwavi

texts.fr: Afiwavi 32 ans, mère d’un enfant de 9 ans scolarisé, elle assure l’entretien et l’éducation de sa progéniture en pratiquant du commerce. Elle commercialise spécialement le maïs, la farine de manioc, le haricot et quelques autres céréales. Afiwavi opère depuis 7 ans cette activité et sollicite un quatrième crédit de WAGES dans le but de s’approvisionner en marchandise. Elle espère avec ce crédit agrandir son activité et trouver un meilleur logement avec les bénéfices générés pour elle et son fils.
texts.en: Afiwavi, 32 years old, is the mother of a 9-year-old child, who is in school. By working in commerce, Afiwavi ensures that her offspring is cared for and is educated. She sells corn, cassava flour, beans, and a few other grains in particular. She has operated this business for seven years and is requesting a fourth WAGES loan with the goal of stocking up on merchandise. With this loan, she hopes to expand her business and to find better housing for her and her son with the profits generated.

loans.use: to purchase grains

loans.name: Miguel  Otilio

texts.es:
Miguel  tiene 21 años  de edad es soltera tiene un hijo  vive con su hijo en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia 

Bolívar.



Es integrante de ventanilla Unión Central Parroquia San José del  Tambo actividad económica agricultura, 

crianza de animales  y comercio la comunidad se encuentra a una hora de la cooperativa.




Miguel se dedica a la  acuicultura  como a la siembra de caña, cacao y a la crianza de animales como gallinas 

y ganado.  


Solicita el crédito para dar mantenimiento a las huertas de cacao. 




La compra lo realiza en San José del tambo.  



Su sueño es perfeccionar técnicamente el manejo del cultivo del cacao para una mejor producción.  



El desafío que se enfrenta es las plagas  que  afectan a la producción.  




En el tiempo libre le gusta caminar libremente por los cultivos, ver televisión y las fiestas de  San José.
texts.en:
Miguel is 21 years old, single and lives with his son in the Chillanes settlement of the Bolívar province.

He is a member of the Unión Central Parroquia San José del Tambo and is a farmer who also raises animals and sells them in the community, located one hour away from the co-op.

Miguel raises sugar cane, cacao, and animals like chickens and livestock.

His challenge are the insects that affect his productions.

He likes to walk among his crops, watch TV and attend the San Jose festivals.

loans.use: to maintain his fields.

loans.name: Dukure Group

texts.fr:
Samia fait partie du groupe  Dukure  et   habite à Gitega. Elle est célibataire et a 26 ans. 
Elle est orpheline de père et a sous sa charge sa mère et ses 9 sœurs et frères.

Elle fait le commerce des habits  depuis 3 ans. 

Elle  est à son  septième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu'elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d’habits  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Avec  le gain de son commerce, elle parvient  à satisfaire les besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Samia is part of the group Dukure and lives in Gitega. She is unmarried and 26 years old. Having lost her father, she is an orphan and supports her mother and nine sisters and brothers. 

Samia has been doing commerce in clothing for three years. She is on her seventh Turame loan. With this KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a lot of clothing to resell, so as to earn more. 

With the profits from her commerce, she is able to satisfy the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a lot of clothing to resell, so as to earn more.

loans.name: Ubumwe Group

texts.fr:
Nestor  fait partie du groupe  Ubumwe  et   habite à Bujumbura. Il  a 53 ans et est mariée à Jeanne, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants, âgés de 2  à 23 ans, tous  étudient.

Il fait le commerce des habits  depuis 5 ans. 

Il  est à son  quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits  à  revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait acheter une machine à coudre  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Nestor belongs to the group Ubumwe and lives in Bujumbura. He is 53 years old and married to Jeanne, a farmer. Together they have four children, from 2 to 23 years old, who are all students. 

Nestor has been doing commerce in clothing for five years. He is on his fourth Turame loan. With this KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase a lot of clothing to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, he would like to purchase a sewing machine and to see his children go to school.

loans.use: to purchase a lot of clothing to resell

loans.name: Komlanvi

texts.fr: Komlavi est un jeune homme de 32ans. Il a pour femme une coiffeuse et ont un enfant d’1an 3mois. Il est réparateur et revendeur d’appareils portables. Il sollicite son troisième crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Il espère avoir un grand local et voir sa famille s’épanouir.
texts.en: Komlavi is a young man, 32 years old. His wife is a hairstylist, and they have one child who is a year and three months old. Komlavi repairs and resells mobile phones. He is requesting his third WAGES loan to purchase merchandise. He hopes to have a large place and to see his family thrive.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phones and accessories

loans.name: Angel Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo  tiene 34 años de edad es  casado tiene dos hijos vive con su esposa en   el Cantón Chillanes  

Provincia Bolívar.




Es integrante de ventanilla Unión Central Parroquia San José del  Tambo actividad económica agricultura, 

crianza de animales  y comercio la comunidad se encuentra a una hora de la cooperativa.




Rodrigo se dedica a la agricultura como a la siembra de cacao. 



Solicita el crédito para ciclo corto, y  al cultivo de granos a corto tiempo como el maíz.  



Las compras realizan en la ciudad de Bucay.  




Su sueño es ampliar el negocio.  



No tiene ningún desafío que enfrentar.  



En el tiempo libre le gusta  descansar.
texts.en:
Rodrigo is 34 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife in the Chillanes settlement of the Bolívar province.

He is a member of the Unión Central Parroquia San José del Tambo and is a farmer who also raises animals and sells them in the community, located one hour away from the co-op.

Rodrigo raises things like cacao.

He is asking for this short term loan so he can raise short cycle crops such as corn.

He makes his purchases in the city of Bucay.

He wants to expand his business.

He has no challenges at the moment and likes to rest in his spare time.

loans.use: to raise short cycle crops.

loans.name: Omorou

texts.fr: Revendeur de pièces détachées automobiles, Omorou est marié et père de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. L’ainé a 13ans et le dernier 03ans. Il sollicite son second prêt pour acheter des pièces détachées. Le profit tiré de la vente lui permettra d’ouvrir d’autres dépôts et voir sa famille grandir dans de bonnes conditions.
texts.en: A retailer of automobile replacement parts, Omorou is a married father of three children, of whom two are in school. The oldest is 13 years old, and the last is 3. Omorou is requesting his second loan for purchasing spare parts. The profits derived from the sales will enable him to open other depots and to see his family grow up under good conditions.

loans.use: to purchase automotive replacement parts

loans.name: Kerly  Susana

texts.es:
Susana tiene 21 años de edad es soltera  tiene un hijo vive con su hijo en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia 

Bolívar. 




Es integrante de ventanilla Unión Central Parroquia San José del  Tambo actividad económica agricultura,

crianza de animales  y comercio la comunidad se encuentra a una hora de la cooperativa.





Susana se dedica a la agricultura como a la siembra de cacao. 



Solicita el crédito para realizar la limpieza de las huertas. 




Las compras lo realizan en la ciudad de Babahoyo  y  Guayaquil.  





Su sueño es poner un negocio.  



No tiene ningún desafío que  enfrentar.  




En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Susana is 21 years old, single and lives with her son in the Chillanes settlement of the Bolívar province.

She is a member of the Unión Central Parroquia San José del Tambo and is a farmer who also raises animals and sells them in the community, located one hour away from the co-op.

Susana raises things like cacao.

She is asking for this loan so she can clean out her fields.

She makes her purchases in Babahoyo and Guayaquil.

She wants to set up her business.

She has no challenges at the moment and likes to listen to music in her spare time.

loans.use: to clean out her fields.

loans.name: Adjowavi

texts.fr: Adjowavi est âgée de 31ans. Elle a pour mari un transitaire et n’a pas pour le moment des enfants en charge. Elle est revendeuse et exerce comme activité la vente de charbon de bois à domicile. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les coins reculés du pays. Son second prêt qu’elle sollicite, lui servira à acheter des charbons de bois afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle voudrait augmenter son stock de marchandises et assurer les besoins primaires de la famille. Notons qu’elle est dans cette activité il y a 02ans.
texts.en: Adjowavi is 31 years old. Her husband is a shipping agent. Adjowavi has no children to support right now. She is a retailer and her business involves selling charcoal at her home. She gets her supplies  in Lomé and from remote corners of the country. Her second loan she is requesting will be used to purchase some charcoal in order to respond better to customer needs. She would like to increase her stock of merchandise and to ensure her family's primary needs are met. Let us take note that she has been in this business for two years.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal

loans.name: Dusenge Group

texts.fr:
Juma  fait partie du groupe Dusenge  et   habite à Ngozi. Il  a 27 ans et est marié à Espérance, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont  2 enfants, âgés de  2 à 6 ans, dont 1 étudie.
Il prend soin de son petit frère qui étudie.

Il fait le commerce de boutique (haricot, riz, huile de palme,…) depuis 4 ans et il a aussi un bistrot. 

Il   est à son  deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz, d’huile de palme, à  revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter un véhicule  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Juma belongs to the group Dusenge and lives in Ngozi. He is 27 years old and married to Espérance, a merchant. Together they have two children, from 2 and 6 years old, of whom one is a student. 

Juma has had a store for four years selling beans, rice, palm oil, ... He also has a bistro. He is on his second Turame loan. With this KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase a large quantity of rice and palm oil to sell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, he would like to purchase a vehicle and to see his children go to school.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of rice and palm oil to sell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.en: Lazaro, married with six children, is a renowned coffee farmer in Nyabihoko Village. He is among the few farmers in the area who have been able to pay his children’s school fees and at the same time put up a permanent house for his family. Due to the high demand for local brew, Lazaro has started a local brewing business, which supplements his income from his banana and coffee plantations. He uses low-priced banana as raw material for brewing his potent gin. He has applied for a loan of 500,000 UGX from UGAFODE to buy organic manure to use on his plantation

loans.use: To buy manure for his coffee plantation

loans.name: Eshe

texts.en:
Eshe was recently approved for an Integrated Loan of 250,000 Albanian Lek (ALL) and is all happy. She wants to buy a dairy cow and some food for animals with this loan.

Eshe lives with her children who are 26, 20 and 23 years old, in a village near a main city in central Albania. She said her husband passed away long ago when her “children were still young and needed attention. "After him passing away, I had to put my act together and work harder to secure our living, and it hasn't been easy since then. My children go to universities and they can’t help me with the agricultural/livestock activity I have been running. And in addition, I have to pay their tuition fees. I have been physically tired and stressed out as well for some time now, but knowing that they will soon finish their schools, it makes me feel relieved,” she continued.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow and food for her animals

loans.name: Ai

texts.en: Ai is 61 years old. She is widowed and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and selling groceries for more than 10 years, earning approximately $7 daily. Three of her children are employed in the garment factory. They earn about $15 each day. In order to improve her livelihood, Ai is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase groceries for resale. This money will help her increase her stock and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn a higher education.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en: Sophal is 49 years old. She is married and resides with her son in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling and grinding rice for more than 10 years, earning approximately $10 daily. Her husband is involved in distilling liquor and animal husbandry. He earns about $10 per day. Her son is a construction worker who makes an income of $7 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sophal is requesting a loan of $660 to purchase farmland to use for farming. This purchase will help her acquire the ability to start a new business and generate additional income. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for farming

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Don Fidel de 52 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus 7 hijos es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos como lo son, maíz y frijol. Don Fidel desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas entre otros asi como muestra la fotografia. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: 52-year-old Fidel is a very responsible man with his household responsibilities, since he has always been characterized by providing the best for his children. Currently, he lives together with his wife and seven children. He is a hard-worker. He has always worked with joy and enthusiasm. He is a farmer and every year sows staples such as corn and beans. Fidel wants to increase his sales, which is why he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides and other inputs like the photograph shows. He hopes to have the requested help, since he does not have other monetary income, and in this way he will continue bringing home the daily bread without limitation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manure, seeds etc.

loans.name: Rosa Enma

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el tomate, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a comercializarla a los mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, Doña Rosa solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar fertilizantes, pesticidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener una mejor cosecha de tomates y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: 50-year-old Rosa lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She is a farmer, and her principal crop is tomatoes. When her harvest is ready, she goes out to sell it in the markets that are near where she lives. With the profit she gets from the sales, and the help of her husband, they are able to cover the household expenses. Rosa is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy fertilizers, pesticides and manure among other inputs in order to have a better tomato harvest and in this way obtain a greater income to give her family what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides etc.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en: Mao is 54 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in rice cultivation and fattening animals for more than 10 years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a motor taxi driver and fisherman. He makes an income of $5 each day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $8 per day. Due to the lack of funds, Mao is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen and a bathroom. This money will help her provide hygienic living conditions for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen and bathroom

loans.name: Juan  Alfonso

texts.es: Don Juan de 63 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde 48 varios años y eso le ha dado la capasidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol cuando su cosecha esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarlos a las agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa en casa propia, Don Juan esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en: 63-year-old Juan has been a farmer for 48 years, which has given him the capacity and knowledge necessary to take care of his crops. His principal crops are corn and beans. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in the silos shown in the photograph in order to later go out and sell them to the staple grain agencies that are near where he lives. With the profits from his sales, he helps with the family expenses. He lives with his wife in their own home. Juan is requesting the loan in order to be able to buy agricultural inputs that will help him grow his crops such as manure, seeds and fertilizers. In this way, he will be able to have greater income and to continue helping with the household expenses without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, seeds etc.

loans.name: Deysi Ysabel

texts.es:
Deysi es una joven de 26 años de edad, es madre soltera y con mucho esfuerzo saca adelante a sus 3 pequeños hijos de 8,5 y 1 añito, Deysi es muy luchadora, y sobre todo le brinda mucho amor a sus hijos, a pesar de las adversidades por las cuales ha atravesado no pierde el ánimo ni las ganas de surgir. La vivienda de Deysi se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú. El distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, esparrago, entre otros.

Cada día Deysi labora en un fundo agrícola como obrera, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo solventa los gastos de su hogar con mucho esfuerzo, ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque sus hijos son el motor para luchar y lo más importante que tienen en la vida.

Deysi está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado  podrá comprar útiles para sus pequeños hijos, ya que han iniciado las clases y no cuentan con los materiales necesarios para poder ir a la escuela, así sus hijos podrán estudiar con los útiles necesarios y Deysi seguirá luchando por sacarlos adelante y hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darles una carrera universitaria a sus hijos y poder tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Deysi is a young woman who is 26 years of age. She is a single mother who strives to succeed for her three young children (ages 8, 5, and 1). Deysi is very determined, but most of all, she provides her children with a lot of love. Despite the adversities she has endured, Deysi has not lost her enthusiasm or her desire to press forward. Her home is located in the District of Santiago in Ica, Peru. The District of Santiago is known for having warm weather and a developed agriculture sector in terms of cotton, asparagus, and other crops.

Deysi works each day as a laborer on a large farming estate. She works approximately nine hours a day and the income from her hard work pays for the household expenses. Deysi believes she is moving forward because her children provide her the motivation to succeed since they are the most important part of her life.

She is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, Deysi will be able to buy supplies for her young children. Classes have already started, but her children do not have the necessary materials so that they can go to school. This loan will allow her children to study with the supplies they need. Deysi continues to move forward so that she can fulfill her greatest wish of providing her children the opportunity to pursue a university degree and having her own business.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Jose De La O

texts.es: Don Jose de 44 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años cultiva maíz y frijol, con las ventas que realiza de sus cultivos lleva el alimento diario a su familia puesto que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Vive en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes junto a su familia, por eso solicita un credito para la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: fertilizantes, semillas, insecticidas, entre otras cosas asi como muestra la fotografia ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante con eso espera poder continuar mejorando las condiciones de vida de él y de su familia
texts.en: 44-year-old Jose lives in his own home with his wife and two children. He has been a farmer for several years. He grows corn and beans. With the sale of his crops, he provides food for his family, since they do not have any other source of income. He lives in simple and humble conditions together with his family, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy the necessary agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, seeds and insecticides among other things like shown in the photograph, which are indispensable for obtaining an abundant harvest. With this, he hopes to be able to continue improving his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides etc.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Don Mario de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 19, 17 y 7 años de edad actualmente ellos estudian, Don Mario se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace 8 años su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía  para luego salir a comercializarlos con las personas que venden granos básicos en los mercados cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ventas de sus cosechas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar pero no le alcanza para cubrir los gastos de su  siembra por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener una mejor cosecha y así tener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: 54-year-old Mario lives in his own home with his wife and children who are 19,17 and 7 years old. Currently, they study. Mario has been a farmer for eight years. His principal crops are corn and beans. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in the silos shown in the photograph to later go out and sell it to the people that sell staples in the markets near where he lives. With the sale of his crops, he is able to cover some of the household expenses, but it is not enough to cover the costs of cultivation. This is why he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure among other things, to obtain a better harvest and in this way have greater income to give his family everything they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manure, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Don Mauricio de 52 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 13 años siembra frijol y maiz cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la va almacenando en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarlos a las ventas de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus 5 hijos. El esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como semillas, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, entre otras cosas ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener un mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: 52-year-old Mauricio has been a farmer for 13 years. He grows beans and corn. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in the silos shown in the photograph to later go sell it to the staple goods sales points near where he lives. With the sales, he is able to cover the household expenses. He is a responsible, honest and hard-working main. He lives with his wife and five children. He is requesting the loan in order to be able to buy inputs for his crops such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides among other things, since what he earns is not enough to cover these costs and in this way he will have a better income and more economic stability.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides, seeds etc.

loans.name: Burungu Karambi Wn Gp Group

texts.en:
Grace is also a member of the above-mentioned group where each one guarantees the other in accessing a loan. She is a 37-year-old mother with three children. Her main business is selling fresh foods but she also deals in eucalyptus trees and dairy farming. She has a challenge of customers who delay to pay and unpredictable weather changes, while her dreams are educating her children to higher levels of education and planting more trees.She is next to Patrick on the right hand side.

Grace intends to use the loan to buy bananas to sell and eucalyptus trees for planting.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell and eucalyptus trees for planting.

loans.name: Peace

texts.en:
Peace was born in 1964 in Bwambara. She is a mother of eight children with four children still in school. Peace is a hardworking lady and she has been able to educate her children and now some have started working.

She is a business lady dealing in coffee. She operates a restaurant from where she gets daily income. Peace first joined   UGAFODE as a group client to access financial services. Afterwards she decided to take an individual loan. 
With this loan she is going to finish her house which is in Kanyinya. She encourages UGAFODE Microfinance Limited (MDI) to continue  assisting because it helps people to accumulate assets and it expands people’s sources of income.

The client has bought land with borrowed funds. She has educated her children and now she has built her own house. And she has been able to expand her restaurant and serve more clients.

loans.use: finish her house

loans.name: Joice

texts.en:
Joice is a 43-year-old widow living in Kasese, Uganda with her two children. She has been the sole provider for the family after the death of her husband. 

Fifteen years ago Joice set up a retail drug shop in order to support her family. Her plans for improvement, though, have been thwarted by inadequate capital and high license fees. 

Joice is applying for a 1,000,000 UGX loan through HOFOKAM to buy more drugs to sell. Her goal is to educate all of her children up to university level with her profits, while her dream is to own a pharmacy.

loans.use: to buy drugs to sell.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: manuel es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol y cuando ya ha paso a cosecha se dedica a albañil con las ganacias que obtiene de sus ventas y el pago de su trabajo ogra solventar algunos de los agstos de su hogar. Manuel desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos,pesticidas, entre otras cosas y tambien mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografia donde siembra sus cultivos, para seguir llevando el pan de cada dia a su hogar.
texts.en: Manuel is a very responsible man with his household responsibilities, since he is characterized by always providing the best for his children. Currently, he lives together with his wife and their two children. He is a farmer and cultivates corn and beans. After the harvest, he works as a construction worker. With the profit he makes from the sale of his harvest and the payments for his labour, he is able to cover some of the household expenses. Manuel wants to increase his sales, which is why he has requested a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, and pesticides among other things and also to improve the soil shown in the photograph where he grows his crops, in order to continue bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, pesticides etc. and improve his soil.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en:
Oliver is a single mother, aged 30. She lives  in Kyotera town council. She describes herself as a hard-working and honest lady. She deals in charcoal selling, and she has been in this business since 2007. She started this business in order to get money to pay school fees for her daughter. She sells her products to residents of Kyotera town council.

She has borrowed 1,000,000 UGX, in order to buy more charcoal  and  buy some large bulbs to attract more grasshoppers . She sells them  seasonally since they  are a delicacy for many of her customers. Her dream is to enlarge these businesses, but she faces the problems of lack of  enough capital and high taxes charged by the town council.

loans.use: To buy  charcoal  and a lso a few large bulbs for her grasshopper business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cookies, sweets, bedspreads, bed sheets, and other merchandise.

loans.name: Lawrence

texts.en:
